attributes.action: Brexit- Make The UK The Greenest Country It Can Be
attributes.background:
The EU set important rules on Pollution, Renewable Energy and looking after our environment. 

Lets ensure that now we are free of the EU we become the Greenest we can be.

Invest in Renewable Energy, Solar Panels on every roof and recycle more.

Lets not reply on Gas/Oil/Fracking any longer.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
